verse.name: c1
verse.lines: The Campbells are comin', Oho! Oho! The Campbells are comin', Oho! Oho! The Campbells are comin' to bonnie Lochleven, The Campbells are comin', Oho! Oho!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Upon the Lomonds I lay, I lay, Upon the Lomonds I lay, I lay, I looked down to bonnie Lochleven, And saw three bonnie perches play

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Great Argyle he goes before, He makes his cannons and guns to roar, Wi' sound o trumpet, pipe and drum The Campbell's are comin' Oho, Oho!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The Campbell's they are a'in arms Their loyal faith and truth to show, Wi banners rattling in the wind The Campbell's are comin Oho, Oho!
